Posts.EditableText: Hey guys, author of Heliacal Hostility here, just making an announcement that I will be competing in the Ludum Dare: a 48 hour challenge to make a game in, well, 48 hours. I'll be submitting a text-adventure made with the quest engine, and credit will be attributed to alex, permitting. once it's submitted, I'll link it here so you can see the fruits of my labour. Look forward to it!
Posts.HTML:
Hey guys, author of Heliacal Hostility here, just making an announcement that I will be competing in the Ludum Dare: a 48 hour challenge to make a game in, well, 48 hours.
I'll be submitting a text-adventure made with the quest engine, and credit will be attributed to alex, permitting.

once it's submitted, I'll link it here so you can see the fruits of my labour.

Look forward to it!
